explanations.machine learning: The abstract mentions that supervised machine learning and deep learning are common computational approaches in the projects surveyed.
explanations.supervised learning: The abstract specifically states that supervised machine learning was one of the most common computational approaches (38.6%).
explanations.deep learning: The abstract mentions deep learning as a common computational approach (34.2%) and also in the analysis of federally funded projects (30.0%).
explanations.neural network: Deep learning is a subset of neural networks, and since deep learning is mentioned, neural networks are implicitly relevant.
